titles.title: To provide that, during the nonresponse followup phase of a decennial census, authorized personnel shall be permitted to deposit a copy of the census questionnaire in the letter box of a household, free of postage.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Census.

bill.summary: 11/10/1999--Introduced. Permits authorized personnel, during the nonresponse followup phase of a decennial census, to deposit a copy of the census questionnaire in the letter box of a household, free of postage.
